name: _LoadingType
description: Restricted code list for Loading subtypes

columns.name: _code
columns.description: Code or short version of a code; for example CH for Switzerland when referring to the UN/LOCODE code list

columns.name: _codeDescription
columns.description: Description or long version of the code; for example Switzerland for Switzerland when referring to the UN/LOCODE code list

columns.name: _codeLevel
columns.description: Integer indicating the level of a code if a codelists is hierarchical; for example HS-Codes

columns.name: _codeListName
columns.description: Official name of the code list without version number when direct reference is not possible; for example UN/LOCODE when referring to the UN/LOCODE code list

columns.name: _codeListReference
columns.description: URL to access the code list the code is taken from; for example https://unece.org/trade/cefact/unlocode-code-list-country-and-territory for UN/LOCODE.

columns.name: _codeListVersion
columns.description: Version of the code list; for example 223-1 for UN/LOCODE. Used if the property codeListName is used or the version is not apparent from the resource referred to in property codeListReference.
